@thehill #Covid19 reveals⬇️
#USA (incl. #Texas/@GovAbbott)v. rich democracies:
1.lowest life expectancy
2.most dangerous,incl. for kids
3.lowest tax on 1%
4.greatest %of pop. in prison
5.greatest# of guns
6.lowest %voters bc of #votersuppression 
7.less democracy,incl bc #ElectoralCollege
